Our team is here to help you, whether it's your savings, investments or feedback. We'd be happy to hear from you.

content.text: To get started, please select a language of your preference.

en.content: We are here to help you with your savings, investments or any feedback that you may have. We'd be happy to hear from you.

content.text: Please pick a language to proceed.

en.content: I'm Sam, a digital employee at National Bonds.

content.text: Are you looking for an office or outlet?

en.content: We have got Sukuk Express Kiosks, Branches and POS Outlets located all around the UAE.

content.text: Would you like to find the closest outlet to you?

en.content: TheForeign Account Tax Compliance Act(FATCA) is a 2010United States federal law which  aims to help counter tax evasion in the US.
FATCA legislation affects only those personal and business customers who are treated as US nationals, for US tax purposes.
National Bonds is committed to being fully compliant with the guidelines issued by UAE Central Bank in relation to FATCA.
For more details on FATCA requirements please visit https://bit.ly/28O5Zn6

content.text: To find out more about National Bonds FATCA policy, please click on the button below.

en.content: The Common Reporting Standard (CRS) is a global system which requires the automatic exchange of financial account information between institutions to reduce tax evasion through enhanced information reporting.
National Bonds is committed to compliance with all requirements and guidelines issued in relation to CRS, as a financial institution regulated by the UAE Central Bank.
For further information on your tax residency, please refer to: https://bit.ly/2bElo7J

en.content: Sukuk Booster is an impressive investment product with expected returns of up to 16% over 4 years.
Sukuk Booster offers returns from 3 months to 4 years, making this ideal for individuals and institutions.
You can begin saving with AED 25,000 and can redeem or withdraw your funds anytime after the 30-day lock-in period.

content.text: Would you like to apply now?

en.content: AED 100. You can begin with as low as that! We recommend you to join myPlan for monthly savings and you could save a minimum of AED 1,000 to avoid paying minimum balance fees.

content.text: Would you like to learn more about the myPlan service?

en.content: We have super simple, incredible saving opportunities!

content.text: Choose any from below and begin sowing seeds to a secure tomorrow.

en.content: A simple 3-step process to secure your child's future. Ensure your child gets the best education, even in the event of unfavourable circumstances.
So secure your little astronaut's/author's/chef's dreams in just a few clicks!
You also might just be eligible for our rewards program!

content.text: May I help you with something else?

en.content: Save time and avoid late fines! Direct Debit lets you select a date on which all your monthly bills/expenses get paid automatically from your account.
So skip the hassle of collecting bills and let National Bonds make life easier!
